# toggleFontPanel(_:)

**Type Method**

Toggles the visibility of the font panel.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func toggleFontPanel(_ sender: Any)
```

## Showing the Font Panel

- **isFontPanelVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the font panel is visible.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the font panel is visible.
